entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then south 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
